statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -4 \\ -3 \\ -1 \\ 3 \\ 1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 3 \\ -4 \\ -1 \\ -3 \\ -4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -25 \\ 0 \\ -1 \\ 21 \\ 16 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -45 \\ 10 \\ 1 \\ 39 \\ 34 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 1 \\ 3 \\ 0 \\ -2 \\ -2 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
